name: Gremlin Digital Video
summary: Learn about .GDV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open and view .GDV files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Gremlin Interactive was a British video game development studio that produced hundreds of video games before being acquired by French publisher Infogrames in 1999. At least four of Gremlin's video games used GDV files, which were saved in the company's proprietary video file format:

description: A GDV file is a video used in a CD-ROM video game produced by Gremlin Interactive. It contains a scene played within the game. GDV files cannot currently be played by any popular media player.

instructions: GDV files are quite uncommon, so no popular media player can open or play them.
